Question: Photonic-Bio Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Photonic-Bio Co., Ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Introducing the new BioScan 2000, a cutting-edge handheld device for non-invasive glucose monitoring
- Utilizes advanced photonic technology for accurate and real-time glucose level measurement
- Compact and portable design for convenient on-the-go use
- Compatible with a user-friendly mobile app for data tracking and analysis
- Offers seamless connectivity with smart devices for easy integration into daily routines
